content: निष्ण, निष्णात {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नि-स्ना-क षत्वं टुत्वं] {@--1@} Clever, skilful, versed, skilled, conversant, expert; निष्णातोपि च वेदांते साधुत्वं नैति दुर्जनः <ls>Bv. 1. 87</ls>; <ls>Bk. 2. 26</ls>; <ls>Śi. 8. 63</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 321.</ls>; <ls>Māl. 2. 7.</ls> {@--2@} Brought about, completed, fully accomplished; <ls>Māl. 10. 24</ls>, (निःशंकं विहितः <ls>Jagaddhara</ls>). {@--3@} Superior, perfect. {@--4@} Agreed upon.
